definitions.definition: An indigo-colored dye obtained from certain plants ( indigo plant or woad ), or a similar synthetic dye.
An indigo plant, such as from species in genera Indigofera , Amorpha ( false indigo ), Baptisia ( wild indigo ), and Psorothamnus and Dalea ( indigo bush ).

secondary_definitions: An indigo-colored dye obtained from certain plants ( indigo plant or woad ), or a similar synthetic dye.
An indigo plant, such as from species in genera Indigofera , Amorpha ( false indigo ), Baptisia ( wild indigo ), and Psorothamnus and Dalea ( indigo bush ).
